title: Cancer Compatibility: What Zodiac Sign Is Most Compatible with Cancer?

steps.title: Scorpio:
steps.content: Scorpio: One of the best matches out there, Scorpio and Cancer redefine the meaning of “opposites attract.” Scorpios approach their emotions with passionate intensity, while Cancers give off a more sensitive, nurturing vibe. Both water signs have some trouble lowering their guard around other signs, yet this mutual distrust makes it easy for them to trust each other. [1] X Research source Scorpios and Cancers both really value their privacy, which boosts this pairing’s compatibility.

steps.title: Pisces:
steps.content: Pisces: Is it really a surprise that the Fish and the Crab mesh well together? The caring, empathetic Pisces gets along swimmingly with the moody, sensitive Cancer. Both water signs know how to support each other through good times and bad, and make for lifelong companions.

steps.title: Taurus:
steps.content: Taurus: This steady, supportive pairing comes straight out of a romantic movie. Bulls and crabs appreciate the material aspects of life while also deeply appreciating one another. Plus, the sensual Taurus is very touchy-feely, making them a great match for the emotional Cancer. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Just like Cancers are known for their tough, outer shell, Tauruses are also known for being thick-skinned. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Reader Poll: We asked 327 wikiHow readers and 91% of them agreed that Cancers are generally family-oriented . [Take Poll] This domestic quality is shared by Tauruses, making this a promising match!

steps.title: Virgo:
steps.content: Virgo: Virgos love people who are available. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This works out well, since Cancer is one of the most devoted and available signs out there. Of course, it doesn’t hurt that both Virgos and Cancers are both well-known for their nurturing, caretaking natures.

steps.title: Cancer:
steps.content: Cancer: A dual Cancer relationship is definitely one of the most supportive ones out there. These identical signs will be on the same wavelength from the get-go, and will always be supportive and mindful of one another’s needs. However, both parties need to exercise plenty of patience, kindness, and empathy to navigate both of their sensitive, emotionally driven personalities.

steps.title: Capricorn:
steps.content: Capricorn: Capricorn and Cancer fall on totally opposite sides of the zodiac wheel, which gives them pretty powerful compatibility. [5] X Research source A classic case of “opposites attract,” Capricorns and Cancers have vastly different emotional preferences, so communication and honesty are really key in this pairing. Cancers are about as sensitive and emotionally driven as they come. Capricorns, on the other hand, manage their emotions in a very practical way. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Leo:
steps.content: Leo: Leo and Cancer match-ups are pretty hit-or-miss. Both signs need to work on keeping their dramatic sides in check to prevent any unnecessary conflict. Still, Sun-powered Leos and Moon-centric Cancers might find some chemistry just because of how opposite they are, even if these opposite traits can lead to equal parts passion and equal parts chaos. Despite their self-assured nature, Leos are very friendly and generous; in fact, they’re the most affectionate sign in the zodiac. [7] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This is a great quality for a partner to have, as Cancers can get a bit wrapped up in their own insecurities.

steps.title: Libra:
steps.content: Libra: Libras are ruled by their thoughts, while Cancers are completely ruled by their feelings. There can definitely be some chemistry between these 2 signs, but the balanced, harmonious Libra likes to spend an equal amount of time with everyone. This may not sit well with the emotional Cancer, who might feel insecure if they don’t get a lot of quality time with their partner. A bit of honesty and disclosure can make a difference for this match-up!

steps.title: Aquarius:
steps.content: Aquarius: This pairing requires some extra effort and understanding to really hit their stride. Cancers prefer to take the well-traveled path, sticking with whatever’s in their comfort zone. The water-bearer, on the other hand, is always looking to explore new frontiers and travel off the beaten path. This relationship can greatly benefit if both signs are willing to find to compromise.

steps.title: Aries:
steps.content: Aries: A relationship between an Aries and a Cancer requires a lot of balance. While there are undeniable sparks between them, the hot-headed, straightforward nature of the ram doesn’t always sit well with the careful, thoughtful crab. Ultimately, Cancers and Aries need to focus on communicating and staying on the same page instead of operating at completely different speeds.

steps.title: Sagittarius:
steps.content: Sagittarius: Adventurous, bold, and on-the-go, the fiery Sagittarius and domestic Cancer tend to have different long-term priorities. Crabs want a cozy happily-ever-after with their partner, while archers yearn to open their sails and explore the world around them. Open communication and a willingness to compromise can go a long way for this pairing. Sagittarius is the most non-committal of all the signs, which isn’t necessarily ideal for the devoted Cancer. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. Still, any pairing can work as long as both parties are willing to put the time and energy in!

steps.title: Gemini:
steps.content: Gemini: Gemini and Cancer’s communication styles are about as different as night and day. A Gemini craves breathing room and independence, while a Cancer thrives on lots of personalized attention. These signs can definitely make things work if they make an effort to listen to and understand one another, but this relationship won’t come easily.

steps.title: Be patient with them.
steps.content: Be patient with them. As the crab of the zodiac, Cancers need time and space to climb out of their shell and really be comfortable with the new people in their life. Trying to rush the relationship won’t do you any favors, and will only hurt your connection in the long run. A Cancer will open up when they’re ready!

steps.title: Communicate with them regularly.
steps.content: Communicate with them regularly. Cancers are as indirect and non-confrontational as they come, so you might have some trouble really figuring out what’s on their mind. Instead, do your best to check in with them regularly, and give them a safe, non-judgmental spot to air their feelings.

steps.title: Give them plenty of attention.
steps.content: Give them plenty of attention. Cancers aren’t necessarily clingy, but they need a lot of support from the partner. Go the extra mile to compliment, support, and uplift the crab in your life, especially if you’re having a rough day. Cancers don’t do well when left to their own devices and prefer to have a hand to hold. Cancers are really sensitive, so be extra gentle and careful when talking with them.
